title: The First Sin
description: THIS BOOK IS NO LONGER AVAILABLEShe was mine-the daughter of the man my father owned. And I claimed every part of her. Because Gianna Carlini had always belonged to me. But someone wanted her more. Someone far more powerful and dangerous than a Mafia Prince like me. She was a pawn in my world, a bargaining chip to be used when the time was right. I just didn't know it. Not until it was too late...
author: Jillian  Quinn
